issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Support writing to byte buffers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7211](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7211). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Parquet in Rust currently only supports writing to files. Extending this to include byte buffers would enable Rust to write to remote targets such as S3.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7211?focusedCommentId=16977961) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5869
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5869>
